licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original summaries.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in completion summaries.
safety: Fail if the session record does not exist.
Reject context and session_id values containing path separators or dot-segments.
Do not overwrite a completed session without explicit intent.

acceptance_criteria: Updates the session record with completion status and timestamp.
Fails if the session record is missing.
Logs a U.Work record when telemetry/log-work is available.

failure_modes: Invalid context or session_id value (not a safe path segment).
Session record missing for the provided session_id.
Failed to write the updated session record file.

inputs.description: Bounded context name used to locate runtime/contexts/<context> (must be a safe path segment).
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Session identifier to complete (safe path segment).
inputs.name: session_id

inputs.description: Optional agent type completing the session.
inputs.name: agent_type

inputs.description: Optional RoleAssignment label used when logging U.Work (default: Strategist).
inputs.name: role_assignment

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related DRR ids or paths.
inputs.name: decisions

inputs.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp_start override (used for deterministic testing).
inputs.name: timestamp_start

intent.goal: Complete an existing agent session record with status and summary.
non_goals: Does not validate Definition of Done requirements.

name: Complete Agent Session

outputs.description: Path to the updated session record markdown file.
outputs.name: session_record_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs (context, session_id, status) and ensure safe path segments.
Load the session record and confirm it has not already been completed.
Update the session record with completion status, timestamp, and summary.
Write the updated session record back to disk.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the session completion with agent metadata when provided.

summary: Completes an agent session with status and summary.
